page.title: 16Transport. Rotherham.
page.content: The South Yorkshire Passenger Transport owns the bus depot. The bus depot is on Midland Rd. 162 people work at the garage and 470 platform staff, women work there also. There are 2 canteens and a social club for the employees. In the depot there are 150 buses but 31 buses are not in use, at the peak period. The bus depot has been open for 2 years 6 months near enough. There are facilities for bus repairs. If the metropolitan Borough is abolished it will revert back to Local Council Control or become a private company. The cheap fares policy will last until the Metropolitan Boroughs are abolished. The colours of Rotherhams buses are cream and brown.
